Discover Easy to Rank Keywords With Keyworder
Find NEW and LOW authority websites that are ranking for keywords you can target on your website and dominate the SERPs!

Most Tools Ignore One Of The Most Important SEO Factors

Many SEO tools often overlook the importance of a siteâ€™s age when it comes to ranking for a keyword.

Instead they give you keyword difficulty scores that are often inaccurate and not the best indicator of whether you can rank for a keyword.

With Keyworder, you can instantly find new websites ranking on Google.

Keyworder highlights new competitors based on the keywords you search. Once you have a competitor with low authority, you can steal the keywords they rank for.


Show Website Age On Google SERPs Using Our Chrome Extension
Instantly find out the age of the websites ranking for a keyword directly from the SERPs using our Chrome extension.
> Use the age filter to see only websites of a certain age.
> Collect the list of new competitors with one click
> Find potential link building opportunities.


Use The Bulk Search Feature To Power Up Your Search
Upload a CSV in our app panel with one or multiple keywords, select their GEO locations and number of Google results for each.
Our software then extracts the Google results for every keyword and provides the domain age for every website. A very powerful feature for bulk keyword research and discovering ranking opportunities.


Find Low Authority Sites That Are Easy To Outrank
Usual keyword research lacks context if your website is brand new.
By discovering new low authority websites, you can uncover lots of keywords that are easy to rank for.
Use Keyworder to find new websites just like yours to steal their traffic.


Find New Competitors In Your Industry and Niche
Traditional keyword research only helps you find big competitors. Now, you can instantly find new sites in your industry that are killing it and copy their strategy.


SERP Keyword Ideas and Analysis
For every search you make we extract all visible keywords and phrases and allow you to export them to CSV sorted by most found.
This is a great way to discover new keywords and phrases you can rank your own site for.
